results.definition: bring to the latest state of technology or supply with the latest data
examples: tonight, I will update my operating system
we updated the database with the most recent figures

results.definition: bring up to date; supply with recent information

examples: do you have the latest software update?
I just heard the update on the unemployment figures

results.definition: modernize or bring up to date
examples: We updated the kitchen in the old house

results.definition: the act of bringing someone or something up to date
examples: the local news station broadcast a special weather update
